```{r table1, echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE, cache = TRUE}
suppressMessages(library(xtable))

smoke <- matrix(c(".","Better","Same","Poorer",
                  "Expected Better",0,-1,-2,
                  "Expected Same",1,0,-1,
                  "Expected Poorer",2,1,0),ncol=4,byrow=TRUE)
colnames(smoke) <- c("","","Q1At+1","")
rownames(smoke) <- c("","","Q1Pt","")

#colnames(smoke) <- c("Better","Same","Poorer")
#rownames(smoke) <- c("Expected Better","Expected Same","Expected Poorer")
#names(dimnames(smoke)) <- c("Q7Pt", "Q7At+1")
smoke <- as.table(smoke)

xt <- xtable(smoke, caption="Possible Expectaion Errors")

#addtorow <- list()
#addtorow$pos <- list(0, 0)
#addtorow$command <- c("& \\multicolumn{3}{c}{Q7At+1} \\\\\n",
#"Q7Pt & Expected Better & Expected Same & Expected Poorer \\\\\n")
#print(xtable(smoke), add.to.row = addtorow, include.colnames = FALSE)

print(xt, "latex",comment=FALSE, caption.placement = getOption("xtable.caption.placement", "top")) 
```
